content: the ava cowl is a delightful 1 skein cowl crochet pattern that is perfect for beginners looking to create a stylish accessory this pattern includes easy-to-follow instructions for crafting a cozy cowl making it versatile for any wardrobe the textured design adds a touch of elegance to any outfit while the written pattern ensures a smooth crocheting experience using bernat s pop yarn in aran weight this project is both soft and durable providing a comfortable wear **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners versatile sizes available one size women s cowl women s scarf textured design adds depth and interest to the finished piece written pattern for easy following **materials needed-** yarn bernat pop aran weight 208 yards hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 gauge 13 stitches by 12 row = 4 inches an ad-free printable version of this pattern can be purchased here https //www etsy com/ca/theloopylamb/listing/661863180/the-ava-cowl-crochet-pattern-instant utm_source=copy&utm_medium=listingmanager&utm_campaign=share&utm_term=so lmsm&share_time=1547822668320 on etsy or here on ravelry follow me on social media instagram @theloopylamb https //www instagram com/theloopylamb facebook www facebook com/theloopylamb https //www facebook com/theloopylamb pinterest www pinterest com/theloopylamb https //www pinterest com/theloopylamb blog www theloopylamb com https //app gosadi com/edit-product/www theloopylamb com
